segments.text: When do you want to have the open house party ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: How do you feel about hiring that clown to come and entertain the kids ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I like that . Then the adults will be more free to mingle and relax .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm so excited . Finally , a yard of my own .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you feel like a king in your castle ?
segments.speaker: S2
